description: Cooking is one of the great pleasures of life & the right cookware is an essential ingredient for good cooking that's why Sumeet has brought one of the most comprehensive ranges of quality cookware. Sumeet Cookware is crafted from finest quality Stainless Steel. Its bonded construction of bottom consists of durable stainless steel encapsulating an aluminum core for even heating throughout. Mirror finish adds Style to your Kitchen to look more beautiful and well decorated. Energy Efficient & Induction Compatible Sandwich bottom prevents the food from getting burnt.

These Kadai can be used both on gas stoves as well as induction cooktop. The Induction Bottom of this cookware makes it efficient for cooking and saves fuel up to 35%, also saves electricity and time. This kadai is a modern version of the traditional Indian cooking utensil used for flavorful food. This Kadai Is Durable For Everyday Cooking And Distributes Heat Evenly So Your Recipes Turn Out Beautifully. You can cook delicious curries, gravies and vegetables.

For increased durability, the kadai uses permanently riveted handles that dont use any screws. Hence taking care of all your kitchen needs Sumeet Stainless Steel Cookware are carefully designed and fabricated with compliance with industry standards. This cookware is manufactured under Strict Quality control. This kadai is strong, durable and convenient to clean & wash. Dishwasher Safe Exterior Adds Versatility And Functionality. Sure to serve you well for a long time, this item is an ideal pick against your valuable currency.
